Articles.Content:
What is Gara?

Benvenuto to Gara, this is a branch off from the original Vagani Car Manufacturers Company. After the unparalleled success of Vagani, the brand decided to try its hand at the wealthier more desirable sports car shapes and so set up the Gara-Vagani branch. Specialising in high performance race cars, Gara has won many prestigious awards by taking part in various Racing events across Kerbin. Gara is heavily inspired by cars from a by gone age of speed and performance, this can be seen in the first pack; Gara Bellezza. Gara still under license from Vagani have all of the typical hardware and software found on the most modern cars. One particular example of this is the brand new compact independent suspension which offers comfort and performance.

How long have they been around?

Gara as a hidden sub-division has been around since the 5th June 2014 with the creation of the Milan Sports Cars and the majorly popular San Marino Sports Cars. Recent leaps and bounds began on the 25th October 2014 when a decision was made to make Gara public and let it design its own cars under its own funding and name.

Packs

The Gara Bellezza Pack

5 Hardcore racers offering superb handling and performance, inspired by Ferrari's 250GTO and Porsche's 911, Gara created the Attacco, California, Romeo, Americano and Sensazione. Pack can be downloaded HERE

Video will be coming out ASAP
nice cars and nice effect for the pic
